title: How to Unsubscribe from Megogo
description: Learn how to cancel your Megogo subscription to avoid future charges. Follow these steps based on where you initially subscribed.

web.title: Unsubscribe via Megogo Website
web.description:
To cancel your Megogo subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Sign in to your Megogo account on the website.
*   Go to 'Subscription management'.
*   Click the 'Unsubscribe' button.
*   Follow the on-screen prompts to confirm cancellation.
*   Cancel at least 24-48 hours before the renewal date.
*   Keep a screenshot or email as proof of cancellation.
*   Note that you will retain access until the end of the paid billing period.

seo_text: Cancel Megogo subscription, unsubscribe from Megogo, Megogo cancellation, stop Megogo payments, manage Megogo subscription
